definition:
Let $\chi$ be a non-trivial primitive character mod $m$. The generalized
Bernoulli numbers $B_{n,\chi}$ are given by
$$\sum_{a=1}^m \chi(a)\frac{te^{at}}{e^{mt}-1}=\sum_{n=0}^\infty B_{n,\chi}\frac{t^n}{n!}$$
They are members of the field $\mathbb{Q}(\chi)$ generated by the values
of $\chi$.
